lead_paragraph: A REMARKABLE MEETING.--At the residence of John Bacon, Esq., Alba Court, there was a gathering to-day of an unbroken band of ten sisters, whose united ages are 702 years, the oldest being 85, and the youngest 57. There are two brothers living belonging to the same family, whose ages swell the number to 832. Two other brothers, one at an early, the other at an advanced age, are the only ones of the family deceased.
